full_summary:
### Tender Announcement
#### Project Monitoring and Evaluation Services
#### Weapons Threat Reduction Program (WTRP) Evaluation

The Department of Foreign Affairs, Trade and Development (DFATD) is issuing a Request for Proposal (RFP) for the evaluation services of the Weapons Threat Reduction Program (WTRP). The evaluation will assess the ongoing relevance and performance of the WTRP, examine areas for improvement and provide recommendations for future program development.

#### Tender Details
- **Reference Number**: cb-491-93322841
- **Publication Date**: December 13, 2023
- **Closing Date**: January 18, 2024, at 2:00 p.m. (14:00)
- **Solicitation Number**: 24-246305-01
- **Amendment Number**: 3
- **Notice Type**: Request for Proposal
- **Procurement Method**: Competitive - Selective Tendering
- **Trade Agreements**: Canada-Colombia Free Trade Agreement, Canada-Panama Free Trade Agreement, Canada-Chile Free Trade Agreement, Canada-Ukraine Free Trade Agreement, and others.
- **Regions of Opportunity**: Canada
- **Regions of Delivery**: Ontario (except NCR), and Canada
- **Contracting Entity**: Department of Foreign Affairs, Trade and Development (DFATD)
- **Contact Information**: Martine Bray, martine.bray@international.gc.ca, (343) 572-6812

#### Documents
A copy of the tender notice and supporting documents can be accessed at https://canadabuys.canada.ca/sites/default/files/webform/tender_notice/27494/tsps---npp-%2824-246305-01_0.pdf

#### Evaluation Services Requirements
The evaluation services will include the following:

* Examination of the ongoing relevance and performance of the WTRP
* Identification of areas for improvement
* Development of recommendations for future program development
* Evaluation of the program's ongoing relevance and performance against the requirements of the Treasury Board Policy on Results and section 42.1 of the Financial Administration Act.

Prospective bidders must submit their proposals electronically through the Canada Buys website. The evaluation panel reserves the right to amend tender documents at any time during the evaluation process.

**Important Note**: The Closing Date for the tender is January 18, 2024, at 2:00 p.m. (14:00). Late submissions will not be accepted. All tender documents and supporting materials must be submitted in English
